name: Beauty Hair Style Spa and Salon For Girls
name_original: Beauty Hair Style Spa and Salon For Girls
description:
For all the budding hair stylist girls out there, Beauty Hair Style Spa Salon brings the fun experience at the touch of your finger, right on your phone!
Spend time in the hair spa and give a special hair treatment by choosing the finest herbal oil, shampoo and conditioner.
Use dandruff medication to treat the scalp with care.
Wash, rinse and steam the hair to make it shine.
Blow dry with the dryer and the hair is now ready for styling.
Choose the length that suits your style and cut the hair.
Apply the hair style that will give her the most beautiful look!
Now it’s time for coloring! Choose from a variety of colors and apply the streaks or full colors for that amazing celeb look!
And last but not the least, go wild with numerous hair accessories like hair bands, bows, clips, tops and lots of hair bling to get to the ultimate makeover!
Take a photo of your creation to store it. You can also share it with your friends on Facebook.
So don’t wait! Become the best hairstylist and create gorgeous makeovers that even celebs and starlets would covet

Features:
-HAIR SPA treatment with SHAMPOO, CONDITIONER and WASH
-SCALP CARE with HERBAL OIL and DANDRUFF medication
-STEAM and BLOW DRY for shining hair ready for styling
-HAIR CUT to keep the length short or long or medium
-CHOOSE HAIR STYLE for a new look every time
-COLOR the hair with streaks or full color chosen from a wide range of colors.
-ACCESSORIES galore! Top up your creation to complete the best HAIR MAKEOVER !
-ENJOY a step by step HAIR SALON experience
-Take PHOTO and share your pretty look and style with your friends
-Full game for FREE (no in app purchase needed)
